record.title: MAKING TECHNICAL CORRECTIONS TO THE NEWBORN SCREENING SAVES LIVES ACT OF 2007
record.narrative:
MAKING TECHNICAL CORRECTIONS TO THE NEWBORN SCREENING SAVES LIVES ACT OF 2007 -- (Senate - May 02, 2008)

[Page: S3749]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the consideration of H.R. 5919.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 5919) to make technical corrections regarding the Newborn Screening Saves Lives Act of 2007.
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read three times, passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, with no intervening action or debate, and that any statements relating to this bill be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The bill (H.R. 5919) was ordered to a third reading, was read the third time, and passed.
